title.rendered: “Strategic Strikes Against Hezbollah: How a Female Observer Led to Successful IDF Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A female look-out identified an operative at a Hezbollah terrorist organization’s observation post, combat aircraft attacked the building in which he was identified.

A short time ago, a female observer from Unit 869 identified an operative of the Hezbollah terrorist organization within the organization’s observation post in Marouahin. Within a short period of time, in conjunction with ground and air forces, combat aircraft attacked the building in which the operative was staying.

Earlier today, combat aircraft attacked another military building of the organization in the Al-Adaisseh area, where organization’s operatives were known to be.

Yesterday (Monday) another military building of the organization in the area of Ayta ash-Shab was attacked.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the building in Marouahin: https://bit.ly/3IJ84AV
